title: Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for January 2025
description: The puzzle solutions for January 2025. The post Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for January 2025 appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Nicholas Tan
excerpt: Here is the answer to the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle today for January 2025, plus the solutions to the other puzzles in the game.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Here you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer throughout the month of January 2025. We will also provide answers to today’s standard puzzles and toss-ups. We will update this article daily (I’m finally back from the holidays!), so we recommend that you check back on a regular basis. The episodes from January 20 to January 24, 2025 will have a Winter Wonderland theme, so some of the puzzles will likely be about snow and winter activities. Hosted by Ryan Seacrest and Vanna White, tonight’s game will feature three new contestants: Dina Marie, Hobbs Carlow, and Daniel Thomas. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for January 21. What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight? The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Tuesday, January 21, 2025 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode. Bonus Round Puzzle – GUPPIES [Living Things] Tossup #1 – RIDING THE SKI LIFT [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #2 – WISHING WELL [Thing] Regular Puzzle #1 – I SMELL SNOW [TV Quote] Regular Puzzle #2 – IT’S COLDER THAN A POLAR BEAR’S PAJAMAS [Weather Report] Regular Puzzle #3 – TRAVELING COMPANIONS [People] Tossup #3 – BRING THE PARTY [Phrase] Tossup #4 – BRING THE NOISE! [Phrase] Tossup #5 – BRING THE EARPLUGS [Phrase] Regular Puzzle #4 – FAMILY VACATION [Event] And here are yesterday’s puzzle answers for Monday, January 20: Bonus Round Puzzle – WRITING A MEMO [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #1 – FUZZY EARMUFFS [What Are You Wearing?] Tossup #2 – BOSTON TERRIER [Living Things] Regular Puzzle #1 – THINGS ARE LOOKING UP [Phrase] Regular Puzzle #2 – SKATING ON THIN ICE CREAM FLOAT [Before & After] Regular Puzzle #3 – THE GREEN MOUNTAINS [Phrase] Tossup #3 – ELECTRIC BLANKET [Thing] Tossup #4 – CASHMERE BLANKET [Thing] Tossup #5 – SECURITY BLANKET [Thing] Regular Puzzle #4 – WINNING A PLAYOFF GAME [What Are You Doing?] The Fan Friday contest by Collette is still active and a new word for the sweepstakes will be posted at some time during the January 24 episode. In a few weeks, from February 3 to February 7, Wheel Watchers can win a getaway by Collette to visit Scotland, Ireland, Iceland, Peru, and Spain. Rules for this Spin, Solve & See The World Giveaway can be found here.
html:
Here you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer throughout the month of January 2025. We will also provide answers to today’s standard puzzles and toss-ups. We will update this article daily (I’m finally back from the holidays!), so we recommend that you check back on a regular basis.

The episodes from January 20 to January 24, 2025 will have a Winter Wonderland theme, so some of the puzzles will likely be about snow and winter activities. Hosted by Ryan Seacrest and Vanna White, tonight’s game will feature three new contestants: Dina Marie, Hobbs Carlow, and Daniel Thomas. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for January 21.

What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight?

The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Tuesday, January 21, 2025 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode.

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – GUPPIES [Living Things]
  • Tossup #1 – RIDING THE SKI LIFT [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #2 – WISHING WELL [Thing]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – I SMELL SNOW [TV Quote]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – IT’S COLDER THAN A POLAR BEAR’S PAJAMAS [Weather Report]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – TRAVELING COMPANIONS [People]
  • Tossup #3 – BRING THE PARTY [Phrase]
  • Tossup #4 – BRING THE NOISE! [Phrase]
  • Tossup #5 – BRING THE EARPLUGS [Phrase]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – FAMILY VACATION [Event]

And here are yesterday’s puzzle answers for Monday, January 20:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – WRITING A MEMO [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #1 – FUZZY EARMUFFS [What Are You Wearing?]
  • Tossup #2 – BOSTON TERRIER [Living Things]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – THINGS ARE LOOKING UP [Phrase]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – SKATING ON THIN ICE CREAM FLOAT [Before & After]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – THE GREEN MOUNTAINS [Phrase]
  • Tossup #3 – ELECTRIC BLANKET [Thing]
  • Tossup #4 – CASHMERE BLANKET [Thing]
  • Tossup #5 – SECURITY BLANKET [Thing]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – WINNING A PLAYOFF GAME [What Are You Doing?]

The Fan Friday contest by Collette is still active and a new word for the sweepstakes will be posted at some time during the January 24 episode.

In a few weeks, from February 3 to February 7, Wheel Watchers can win a getaway by Collette to visit Scotland, Ireland, Iceland, Peru, and Spain. Rules for this Spin, Solve & See The World Giveaway can be found here.
